name: It Came From The Closet
description:
Play as a monster sneaking through a house in the middle of the night. Find the sleeping  boy and scare him to complete your demonic court-ordered community service.

Features

  • Every enemy has a unique path-finding and noise searching AI
  • There are 21 levels in the game with two distinct game modes
  • All of the pixel art used in game is a four-color red scale pallet
  • The game's dark and menacing soundtrack is composed of all original music 
  • The game runs at a default 60 frames per second

The game contains no violence, sexual themes,  profane language, or simulated gambling
